title: 17:15 Hamilton - 3rd September 2025 Results
description: Get the full horse race result from the 17:15 at Hamilton on the 3rd September 2025
content:
A winner at 5f on good ground. Beaten 3/4l by Miss Rainbow when second of 9 at 5-2fav on her latest outing at Thirsk over 6f (good) in July. She is wearing blinkers for the first time. A winner at 5f on good ground. Beaten 3/4l by Miss Rainbow when second of 9 at 5-2fav on her latest outing at Thirsk over 6f (good) in July. She is wearing blinkers for the first time.

She has won four times at 6f on ground varying from good to soft. Third of 9 behind Without Flaw beaten 1/2l at 7-2 on her latest outing at Beverley over 5f (soft) in July. She has won four times at 6f on ground varying from good to soft. Third of 9 behind Without Flaw beaten 1/2l at 7-2 on her latest outing at Beverley over 5f (soft) in July.

Winner of seven races from 5f to 7f on good and good to soft ground and on the all-weather. Beaten 1/2l by Sibyl Charm when second of 9 at 2-1fav on her latest outing at Ayr over 6f (good) last month. Winner of seven races from 5f to 7f on good and good to soft ground and on the all-weather. Beaten 1/2l by Sibyl Charm when second of 9 at 2-1fav on her latest outing at Ayr over 6f (good) last month.

Successful twice at 6f on good to soft and soft ground. Beaten 12l behind Havana Sky at 33-1 when last of 11 on his latest outing at Wolverhampton over 6f last month. Successful twice at 6f on good to soft and soft ground. Beaten 12l behind Havana Sky at 33-1 when last of 11 on his latest outing at Wolverhampton over 6f last month.

She has won three times from 5f to 6f on good to firm and good ground. Beaten 4 1/2l behind Royal Duke at 13-8fav when seventh of 9 on her latest outing at Musselburgh over 5f (good) last month. Has won 3 times this season. She has won three times from 5f to 6f on good to firm and good ground. Beaten 4 1/2l behind Royal Duke at 13-8fav when seventh of 9 on her latest outing at Musselburgh over 5f (good) last month. Has won 3 times this season.

She has won three times from 6f to 7f on good to firm and good ground and on the all-weather. Third of 5 behind Court Drive beaten 2 1/2l at 7-2 on her latest outing at Pontefract over 6f (good to firm) last month. She has won three times from 6f to 7f on good to firm and good ground and on the all-weather. Third of 5 behind Court Drive beaten 2 1/2l at 7-2 on her latest outing at Pontefract over 6f (good to firm) last month.

Successful twice at 7f on good and good to soft ground. Beaten 4 1/2l behind Promise Time at 20-1 when seventh of 10 on his latest outing at Carlisle over 6f (good) last month. Successful twice at 7f on good and good to soft ground. Beaten 4 1/2l behind Promise Time at 20-1 when seventh of 10 on his latest outing at Carlisle over 6f (good) last month.

A winner at 6f on heavy ground, but that win was over two years ago. Beaten a neck by Royal Duke when second of 9 at 13-2 on his latest outing at Musselburgh over 5f (good) last month. A winner at 6f on heavy ground, but that win was over two years ago. Beaten a neck by Royal Duke when second of 9 at 13-2 on his latest outing at Musselburgh over 5f (good) last month.

Winner of five races from 5f to 6f on good to soft and soft ground. A winner at 3-1 here over 5f (good to soft) on his latest outing last month, beating Masterclass by 3/4l. Winner of five races from 5f to 6f on good to soft and soft ground. A winner at 3-1 here over 5f (good to soft) on his latest outing last month, beating Masterclass by 3/4l.

keywords.name: good to firm and good ground
good to soft and soft ground

summary: The 3rd September 2025 results will be announced at 17:15 Hamilton - 3rd October, with a winner at 5f on good ground, beaten 3/4l by Miss Rainbow when second of 9 at 5-2fav on her latest outing at Thirsk over 6f (good) in July. She is wearing blinkers for the first time. She has won four times at 6f on ground varying from good to soft, and has also won three races from 5f to 7f. Other notable results include a winner on heavy ground, but a winner of 6f was over two years ago.
shortSummary: A winner at 5f on good ground and successful multiple others in her season, including Miss Rainbow and Sibyl Charm, are among the top performers in the Hamilton-based event.

Sun Racing: Horse Racing News 17+
Top tips, live odds & results
Punters Paradise UK Limited
Designed for iPhone
-
- Free
iPhone Screenshots
Description
The Sun Racing app is here and we've got the bookies running for cover - our brilliant app is free to download and brings the power back to the punter.
You'll be fully equipped to break down the bookies with the best odds and tips as well as our unique predictor tool to help you pick winners. And if you can't decide - WHIP IT! - shake your phone and let lady luck pick for you.
Get up-to-date news, big-race previews, tips from Sun Racing’s experts - including Matt Chapman, Chris Hughes and Sam Twiston-Davies - comprehensive form guides, a watchlist to keep track of your bets for the day, and plenty more.
Key features include:
RACECARDS
Get ahead of the pack with the latest runners and riders from the racecards, full form guides for both UK and Irish racing, as well as up-to-date declarations, market movers and vital non-runner news.
RESULTS
You'll find a full horse racing results service is available, including fast results as soon as they’ve passed the post.
BEST ODDS
Compare the best racing odds from our leading bookmaker partners - Ladbrokes, Coral, Betway, Paddy Power and Betfair. Your app will be alive with steamers and drifters so you can see who’s hot and who’s not, while our live odds will keep you more in the know than ever before.
FREE BETS & OFFERS
Everyone loves a free bet and we’ve got the finest sign-up offers you could wish for, alongside the hottest bonuses on the market. Don’t miss out on our must-have list of all the top offers from our bookmaker partners, so you can find the best way of funding your betting bank.
PREDICTOR
Whittle down the form based on anything from weight to jockey wins using the most comprehensive betting tool in the business - you’ll be a racing guru before you can say “Frankie Dettori”. Tailor the tool to your specific needs and once you’ve nailed the variants there'll be no stopping you in your pursuit of punting excellence.
TIPS
Come rain or shine, our fleet of top tipsters are here to pick you winners. Templegate, Matt Chapman, Chris Hughes and Tom Bull are ready to go into bookie battle with punting weapons drawn - and they usually win.
Get first hand insights from Sam Twiston-Davies on all his rides and more!
NEWS
We’re the No. 1 place for racing news, whether it’s breaking stories, hot gossip or race reports. There’s nowhere better.
WATCHLIST
Keep your ear to the turf with our hot-to-trot Watchlist. Star your favourite horses or those you've had a bet on and track their results throughout the day. Whether following a golden oldie or eyeing up a newcomer, it’s an organisational paradise that’s not to be missed for all racing lovers.
WHIP IT
Don't know who to pick? Give your phone a shake and let lady luck pick a horse for you at random. You could be onto a winner.
Download the Sun Racing app now, your ultimate horse racing companion.
This app requires you to be over 18.
What’s New
Version 5.19.0
General updates.
Ratings and Reviews
Sun-Shines on a Rainy Day
OMG...Sun Racing has changed my life. The other day it was raining on and off all the time and I decided to have a flutter on the Gigis, I had a look at the Sun app and used the predictor tool and I haven’t looked back since! I used to back losers all the time but now...? Generally, I go with my gut and I have had a few winners and a few places but without much success. However, with the app if it affirms what I’ve already thought I’ll go with it and now I am winning big! I haven’t loved The Sun so much since Sam Fox was on page 3!
Watchlist
Luv this app but for the last week or so my selections haven’t been going over to the watchlist
Mr Robert
Your race tipping is very inconsistent you can go 2 or more days without renewing your long shot and ew thief tips which I follow every day (not doing much good lately) I buy the sun every day but it is still handy to get my bets on early via my iPad apart from that your racing coverage is fine
App Privacy
The developer, Punters Paradise UK Limited, indicated that the app’s privacy practices may include handling of data as described below. For more information, see the developer’s privacy policy.
Data Used to Track You
The following data may be used to track you across apps and websites owned by other companies:
- Identifiers
Data Not Linked to You
The following data may be collected but it is not linked to your identity:
- Identifiers
- Usage Data
- Diagnostics
Privacy practices may vary based on, for example, the features you use or your age. Learn More
Information

- Punters Paradise UK Limited
- Size
- 39.8 MB
- Category
- Sports
- Compatibility
-
- iPhone

- Mac
- Requires macOS 11.0 or later and a Mac with Apple M1 chip or later.

- Requires visionOS 1.0 or later.
